vulnerability.name: USN-4001-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4001-1 fixed a vulnerability in libseccomp. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Jann Horn discovered that libseccomp did not correctly generate 64-bit  syscall argument comparisons with arithmetic operators (LT, GT, LE, GE).  An attacker could use this to bypass intended access restrictions for  argument-filtered system calls.

statements.status_notes: libseccomp could allow unintended access to system calls.
